newsitem.title: USA: AmeriGas adds 1.75 mln gals in purchases.
newsitem.headline: AmeriGas adds 1.75 mln gals in purchases.

text.p: AmeriGas Partners LP said it recently acquired the assets of three propane marketers in South Carolina, Florida and Louisiana, adding about 3,700 customers to its customer base and 1,750,000 gallons to its annual retail propane volume.

The acquired operations include First National Gas, Hialeah, Fla.; Hollier Gas, Mamou, La.; and the Charleston Propane business of Worsley Cos, Charleston, S.C. Terms of the transactions were not disclosed, AmeriGas said.
"AmeriGas is constantly seeking acquisitions that provide benefits to both the seller and AmeriGas," said William Katz, vice president of corporate development.
AmeriGas Partners is the nation's largest propane marketer, operating from 600 locations in 44 states. UGI Corp owns 58 percent of the partnership.
